typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as integer,
		HIREDATE as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptnosource
empsource derive(TOTAL_SAL = toInteger(SAL)+iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0)) ~> TotalSal
TotalSal select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_NUMBER = EMPNO,
		EMPLOYEE_NAME = ENAME,
		JOB_NAME = JOB,
		HIREDATE,
		SALARY = SAL,
		COMMISION = COMM,
		DEPTNO,
		TOTAL_SAL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(EMPKEY as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(toInteger(SALARY)>1000) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(asc(EMPLOYEE_NAME, true),
	caseInsensitive: true,
	partitionLevel: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sort1
empsource, deptnosource join(empsource@DEPTNO == deptnosource@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO = empsource@DEPTNO,
		Deptno = deptnosource@Deptno,
		Dname,
		Loc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emp_target.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
